title: Cannot connect to a game.
body: Since last night I have been unable to connect to a game of league, be it ranked, normals, arams, or customs. I have repaired my client, reinstalled my  client, updated windows, updated directx, updated graphics drivers, and even made sure that league was on the exception for my firewall. As soon as the game tries to load in, I get nothing but a bug splat Crash Report #154487860.

replies.body: Is this happening in the Regular or Alpha client?
It was happening on both before I uninstalled the alpha when i reinstalled the regular client.
So now you aren't experiencing this anymore after switching back to the regular client?

No I'm still having the same issue, even after uninstalling both clients and reinstalling the regular client. I'm still getting the bug splat the second I try to load any game mode, with doing all that I stated before.

Gotcha. So, bugsplats are most often caused by driver or hardware issues that cause League to flip out. Out [Bugsplat guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) covers the most common solutions for this, so I think that's a good place to go next.

Let me know if those steps helped.
I've been having similar issues too, can't play any format of game modes and I really wanted to get one good rank climb before season end {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
